question:
You have some time off work and are hoping to visit a close friend, Stephanie, for a few days. Write a letter to your friend. In your letter
    • suggest spending time together
    • explain why you have time to do this
    • propose some activities


Write at least 150 words.
text: Greetings from India, its been almost two years since we last saw each other. I am excited to tell you that I will be in San Francisco on the 12th.
I was looking forward to going on an adventure with you and possibly relive some of the weekend escapades we had when I lived there.

The reason I will be in San Francisco is to actually attend a technical conference where I will be presenting a paper on swarm technology. After which I have a week to explore some places that are on my bucket list.

For example, I was thinking we could go to Big Sur where I heard that the California Poppy flowers are in full bloom. I also wanted to visit Peiffer beach which is known for its purple sand. But we have to book tickets in advance because entry is limited and it's in an isolated area.
In conclusion, I am eagerly waiting to meet you and rent a convertible so we can get the full California experience.

error_list.error_des: The word its doesn’t seem to fit this context. Consider replacing it with a different one.
